message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product that I think you'll really love. I'm looking for $12,000 for it.
Alice, your product looks great, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to offer $10,500. Let's see if we can make this work.
I understand that $10,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $11,750?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. I'm still a little high with $11,750.  How about we split the difference and settle on $11,250? This is the highest I can go right now.
I'm not quite there yet, but I'm getting closer. I can do $11,500. That's the lowest I can go.
